chapter.title: Introduction to &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor
chapter.para: The JSR 309 is designed to provide server-based Java applications with multimedia capabilities. It defines API and programming model, which create general interface to media servier. This interface abstracts from control protocol used to connecto media server.
&THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor is based on &THIS.PLATFORM; implementation of JSR 309, which is based on MGCP.
